path.description:
Path to the wallpaper image. Can be absolute, relative, or empty to use default.

Default: ./Assets/Wallpapers/default.png

horizontal_mirror.description:
This property holds whether the image should be horizontally inverted (effectively displaying a mirrored image).

Default: false

vertical_mirror.description:
This property holds whether the image should be vertically inverted (effectively displaying a mirrored image).

Default: false

smooth.description:
This property holds whether the image is smoothly filtered when scaled or transformed.

Default: true

mipmap.description:
This property holds whether the image uses mipmap filtering when scaled or transformed.

Default: false

auto_transform.description:
This property holds whether the image should automatically apply image transformation metadata such as EXIF orientation.

Default: true

fill_mode.description:
Set this property to define what happens when the source image has a different size than the item.

Default: PreserveAspectFit

oneOf.description: Scale the image to fill the area exactly, ignoring aspect ratio.
Scale the image to fit inside the area while preserving aspect ratio.
Scale the image to completely cover the area while preserving aspect ratio.
Repeat the image in both directions.
Center the image without scaling; pad the remaining area.
